article:
Every evening Mr. Black walked from his office to the  _  after work. He often passed a poor man  _ at the side of the road, an old dog sat  _  him. There was a piece of wood round the dog's neck with the words "I'm blind  ."
Mr. Black was a kind man. He _ gave the poor man a little money. One day Mr. Black had a lot of work in his office and was late. To catch the train, he walked quickly without _ to give any money to the poor man .But the man stood up quickly, ran _  him and said, "You haven't given me anything today. Give me a little money today, too. I'm a  _ man."
Mr. Black was  _  and said, "You are a blind man. How can you  _  me?" But the poor man said, "No, I am not blind.  _ my dog is."
